00022 #region Usings
00023 using System;
00024 using System.Collections.Generic;
00025 using System.Security.Cryptography;
00026 using System.Text;
00027 using Utilities.DataTypes;
00028 #endregion
00029 
00030 namespace Utilities.Web.OAuth
00031 {
00035     public class OAuth
00036     {
00037         #region Constructor
00038 
00042         public OAuth()
00043         {
00044             Parameters = new System.Collections.Generic.List<Pair<string,string>>();
00045             AddParameter("oauth_consumer_key", "");
00046             AddParameter("oauth_nonce", "");
00047             AddParameter("oauth_signature_method", "");
00048             AddParameter("oauth_timestamp", "");
00049             AddParameter("oauth_version", "1.0");
00050             RandomGenerator = new Random.Random();
00051         }
00052 
00053         #endregion
00054 
00055         #region Protected Functions
00056 
00061         protected string GenerateRequest()
00062         {
00063             string Url="";
00064             string Parameters="";
00065             string Signature=GenerateSignature(out Url,out Parameters);
00066             string ReturnUrl = Url.ToString() + "?" + Parameters + "&oauth_signature=" + UrlEncode(Signature);
00067             return ReturnUrl;
00068         }
00069 
00076         protected string GenerateSignature(out string Url,out string Parameters)
00077         {
00078             Parameters = "";
00079             Url = "";
00080 
00081             if (this.SignatureType == Signature.HMACSHA1)
00082             {
00083                 string Base = GenerateBase(out Url, out Parameters);
00084                 HMACSHA1 SHA1 = new HMACSHA1();
00085                 SHA1.Key = Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(UrlEncode(ConsumerKeySecret) + "&" + (string.IsNullOrEmpty(TokenSecret) ? "" : UrlEncode(TokenSecret)));
00086                 return Convert.ToBase64String(SHA1.ComputeHash(System.Text.Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(Base)));
00087             }
00088             else if (this.SignatureType == Signature.RSASHA1)
00089             {
00090                 throw new NotImplementedException();
00091             }
00092             else if (this.SignatureType == Signature.PLAINTEXT)
00093             {
00094                 return UrlEncode(ConsumerKeySecret + "&" + TokenSecret);
00095             }
00096             return "";
00097         }
00098 
00104         protected string UrlEncode(string Input)
00105         {
00106             StringBuilder Result = new StringBuilder();
00107             for (int x = 0; x < Input.Length; ++x)
00108             {
00109                 if (UnreservedChars.IndexOf(Input[x]) != -1)
00110                     Result.Append(Input[x]);
00111                 else
00112                     Result.Append("%" + String.Format("{0:X2}", (int)Input[x]));
00113             }
00114             return Result.ToString();
00115         }
00116 
00122         protected void AddParameter(string Key, string Value)
00123         {
00124             bool Found = false;
00125             foreach (Pair<string, string> Pair in Parameters)
00126             {
00127                 if (Pair.Left == Key)
00128                 {
00129                     Pair.Right = Value;
00130                     Found = true;
00131                     break;
00132                 }
00133             }
00134             if (!Found)
00135             {
00136                 Parameters.Add(new Pair<string, string>(Key, Value));
00137             }
00138         }
00139 
00140         #endregion
00141 
00142         #region Private Functions
00143 
00150         private string GenerateBase(out string UrlString, out string ParameterString)
00151         {
00152             StringBuilder UrlBuilder = new StringBuilder();
00153             StringBuilder Builder = new StringBuilder();
00154             StringBuilder ParameterBuilder = new StringBuilder();
00155 
00156             string SignatureMethod = "";
00157             if (this.SignatureType == Signature.HMACSHA1)
00158                 SignatureMethod = "HMAC-SHA1";
00159             else if (this.SignatureType == Signature.RSASHA1)
00160                 SignatureMethod = "RSA-SHA1";
00161             else if (this.SignatureType == Signature.PLAINTEXT)
00162                 SignatureMethod = "PLAINTEXT";
00163 
00164             AddParameter("oauth_consumer_key", this.ConsumerKey);
00165             AddParameter("oauth_nonce", RandomGenerator.Next(123400, 9999999).ToString());
00166             AddParameter("oauth_signature_method", SignatureMethod);
00167             AddParameter("oauth_timestamp", Convert.ToInt64((DateTime.UtcNow - new DateTime(1970, 1, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0)).TotalSeconds).ToString());
00168             AddParameter("oauth_version", "1.0");
00169 
00170             if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(this.Token))
00171                 AddParameter("oauth_token", this.Token);
00172             if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(this.TokenSecret))
00173                 AddParameter("oauth_token_secret", this.TokenSecret);
00174 
00175             Parameters.Sort(new PairComparer());
00176 
00177             string Splitter = "";
00178             foreach (Pair<string, string> Key in Parameters)
00179             {
00180                 ParameterBuilder.Append(Splitter)
00181                     .Append(Key.Left)
00182                     .Append("=")
00183                     .Append(UrlEncode(Key.Right));
00184                 Splitter = "&";
00185             }
00186 
00187             UrlBuilder.Append(Url.Scheme).Append("://").Append(Url.Host);
00188             if ((Url.Scheme == "http" && Url.Port != 80) || (Url.Scheme == "https" && Url.Port != 443))
00189                 UrlBuilder.Append(":").Append(Url.Port);
00190             UrlBuilder.Append(Url.AbsolutePath);
00191 
00192             UrlString = UrlBuilder.ToString();
00193             ParameterString = ParameterBuilder.ToString();
00194 
00195             Builder.Append(this.Method.ToString().ToUpper())
00196                 .Append("&")
00197                 .Append(UrlEncode(UrlBuilder.ToString()))
00198                 .Append("&")
00199                 .Append(UrlEncode(ParameterBuilder.ToString()));
00200 
00201             return Builder.ToString();
00202         }
00203

00247         private string UnreservedChars = "abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyzABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ0123456789-_.~";
00248         private System.Collections.Generic.List<Pair<string, string>> Parameters { get; set; }
00249         private Random.Random RandomGenerator { get; set; }

00253         #region Private Classes

00258         private class PairComparer : IComparer<Pair<string,string>>
00259         {
00260             public int Compare(Pair<string, string> x, Pair<string, string> y)
00261             {
00262                 if (x.Left == y.Left)
00263                 {
00264                     return string.Compare(x.Right, y.Right);
00265                 }
00266                 else
00267                 {
00268                     return string.Compare(x.Left, y.Left);
00269                 }
00270             }
00271         }
00272 
00273         #endregion
00274     }
